name: The Arch
description:
Enjoy a relaxing walk in this contemplative game, in search of a lost Arch.

🎮 HOW TO PLAY ?
- Left click on the tiles to move to the next environment.

This game is our entry for the VGLab GameJam 2021 !

Made by Lauréline Chambon and Thob, music by Thibault Manfredi
- https://twitter.com/Ydrenor
- https://twitter.com/Thobinambours
- https://www.instagram.com/tibo_sganarel/?hl=af

We hope you'll like it !

🔧 CHANGELOG
- 08/11 : add a webGL build, update credits

📃 CREDITS
Game made with Unity and Playmaker, sounds from Freesound.com.
- cricket sound : https://freesound.org/people/acclivity/sounds/83928/
